sections.heading: Overview
content: Summer Epps is an undergraduate student at the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill. She attends the Hussman School of Journalism and Media, and is minoring in Women and Gender Studies. As a news intern for WebMD, she covers current health topics and takes a special interest in mental and social health. Epps is a resident of Atlanta, GA, where she enjoys playing basketball, cooking, and hiking in her free time.
